articles.title: Google's Nearby Share arrives on Windows to let you transfer files between PC and Android
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.excerpt: The beta app is available in the US and elsewhere
articles.summary:
Google's AirDrop competitor, Nearby Share, is now available on Windows as a beta app. After announcing plans for Nearby Share on Windows 
at CES 2022
, Google has finally shipped the 
Windows app as a beta
 to allow Android users to share photos, documents, files, and links between Android devices and Windows PCs.
The Windows Nearby Share just needs to be installed and configured to start sending and receiving files between Android and Windows devices. Google is supporting Windows 10 and up, but ARM-powered Windows laptops aren't supported right now.

articles.title: Google warns billions over two eerie ‘photo alerts' that mean you're already a victim – spot sinister ‘attack'
articles.author: Head
articles.excerpt: GOOGLE says all users must be on alert for suspicious activity in their photos app. If you ignore it or don't check for two dangerous signs regularly, you're taking a serious risk. Goog…
articles.summary:
GOOGLE says all users must be on alert for suspicious activity in their photos app.

If you ignore it or don't check for two dangerous signs regularly, you're taking a serious risk.

Google Photos is a great way to back up and store your images.

But it also poses a security risk if someone virtually breaks in, so Google has warned that you need to look out for "suspicious" activity.

The activity is deemed suspicious if one of two following situations occur, according to Google.

The first is if you notice that your photo albums have been shared without your permission.

articles.title: Google makes sharing files between Windows and Android much easier
articles.author: Taras Buria
articles.excerpt: Google has introduced a new application for Windows 10 and 11 computers, allowing much easier file transfer between PCs and Android-powered smartphones, tablets, and other devices.
articles.summary:
After failing to conquer the mobile market with Windows Phone, Microsoft is trying hard to befriend Android with Windows 11. The Phone Link application provides many unique features to those using PCs and Android devices. However, it is not the only option you can use. Google's latest app makes transferring files from Windows computers to Android (and vice versa) much easier.
 
Nearby Share, 
a feature Google introduced in 2020 for Android smartphones
, is now available on Windows in select markets thanks to Google's latest application (do not confuse this with Microsoft's Nearby sharing in Windows 10 and 11).

articles.title: Windows Users, Wave Away Those Apple AirDrop Envy Blues With Google's 'Nearby Share'
articles.author: Ananya Gairola
articles.summary:
The beta version of Alphabet Inc.'s GOOG GOOGL 'Nearby Share' — an answer to Apple Inc ‘s AAPL AirDrop feature — is now available for people using Microsoft Corporation MSFT Windows operating system.

What Happened: Google has finally announced Android's Nearby Share feature for desktop users using the new Windows app.

The new version will make it easier for users to share photos, documents and links between Android devices and systems running on Windows OS — just like AirDrops work in the Apple universe.

articles.title: Google plans to add AI tools to its search engine
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.excerpt: After Bard's underwhelming start, Google is looking for ways to compete in the generative AI race.
articles.summary:
Google Bard got off to a rocky start, with inaccurate information in its demo and then an underwhelming launch. Only two weeks after launch, CEO Sundar Pichai called Bard to a 'a souped-up Civic' compared to ChatGPT and Bing Chat.

Now Pichai is talking about turning up the heat on Google's AI efforts.

In an interview with The Wall Street Journal, the CEO revealed that Google plans to add AI features to Google's search engine.

"Will people be able to ask questions to Google and engage with LLMs in the context of search? Absolutely," Mr.

articles.title: Google launches ‘Nearby Share' beta for Windows app.. Available in Korea
articles.author: archyde
articles.excerpt: Google brings Android file sharing service ‘Nearby Share' to Windows PC According to foreign media on the 3rd (local time), Google announced that it will release a beta app called ‘Nearby Share' for Windows that can transfer files between Android devices and PCs. The ‘Nearby Share' feature is similar to Apple's Airdrop. You can share ... Read more
articles.summary:
Google brings Android file sharing service ‘Nearby Share' to Windows PC

According to foreign media on the 3rd (local time), Google announced that it will release a beta app called ‘Nearby Share' for Windows that can transfer files between Android devices and PCs.

The ‘Nearby Share' feature is similar to Apple's Airdrop. You can share a variety of content, including photos, videos, documents, and links, with nearby Android smartphones and tablets using Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, or NFC.

Until now, sharing was possible with Android devices, but installing the Nearby Share beta for Windows app will enable sharing between Android devices and Windows 10 or later (64-bit) PCs.

articles.title: How to Brainstorm and Plan Events With Friends and Family
articles.author: J. D. Biersdorfer
articles.excerpt: Many apps and tools for online collaboration work just as well for personal projects as they do for office tasks, and can be fun.
articles.summary:
Have you ever tried planning a big event with friends or family — like a vacation, a home renovation or a reunion — and wished you could get everyone on the metaphorical same page?

Thanks to apps that support collaboration, you can get all parties together in the same online whiteboard, calendar, document or other file. And you can get started with free software that may already be on your phone, tablet and computer. Here's an overview.

Getting Started

Apple's iOS and Google's Android systems include free apps that support group participation.

articles.title: How does Google Photos iOS app backup handle iCloud Shared Library?
articles.author: invalid@example.com
articles.excerpt: Anyone know when backup is turned on in Google Photos iOS app whether it only syncs the photos in my iPhone personal library or also from the iCloud Shared Photos Library I'm a part of?
articles.summary:
Anyone know when backup is turned on in Google Photos iOS app whether it only syncs the photos in my iPhone personal library or also from the iCloud Shared Photos Library I'm a part of?
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
I have essentially the same question, with the add on how Google Photos handles duplicates shared between two people who also share iCloud Photo Libraries, should Google upload all photos.


Did you ever get to try this out?
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
when you turn on backup in the google photos ios app, it only syncs photos in your iPhone personal library and not from the iCloud shared photos.

articles.title: Google: Bard Isn't A Failure (NASDAQ:GOOG)
articles.author: Growth At A Good Price
articles.excerpt: Lately Alphabet stock has been see-sawing with news about its AI efforts. Click here to see our take on GOOG stock.
articles.summary:
Anna Moneymaker
 
Last month, we saw 
Google
 (
NASDAQ:
GOOG
) release its Bard chatbot to much fanfare and commentary. The early response 
was muted
, with many reviewers saying it performed less well than ChatGPT and Bing at many
 tasks. Later, some reviewers noted that Bard was 
faster
 than Bing, but the overall impression from most reviews was that ChatGPT gave better quality replies.
 
This mixed response to Bard might be part of why GOOG has 
underperformed
 
Microsoft
 (
MSFT
) this year.

articles.title: Google have finally developed a form of AirDrop with Nearby Share
articles.author: Christopher Mcfadden
articles.excerpt: Android and PC users are now able to share files like Apple's AirDrop. Called Nearby Share, while still in Beta it is a very useful little function indeed.
articles.summary:
But Google and Microsoft have finally worked this out after years of battling with various standards and technologies: In 2020, 
Google's Nearby Share protocol
 gave Android phones a way to share files like Apple's AirDrop. Now, with the help of a fresh beta that anybody can download, the same function is accessible on Windows PCs as well.
Since this new Google app is still in beta testing, installation can be challenging. However, it does function well, so setting it up is worthwhile, but check a few things first.

articles.title: Google launches Nearby Share Beta for sharing files between Windows and Android
articles.author: Lance Whitney
articles.excerpt: The new beta app expands Google's Nearby Share tool so that it will now work with Windows PCs. Here's how to try it out.
articles.summary:
Unveiled back in 2020, Google's Nearby Share provided a way for people to share files between different Android devices. Now, the company is enhancing the feature to include Windows in the mix.

In a blog post published Monday, Google announced a new beta version of the Nearby Share tool designed to let you share photos, videos, documents, and other files between Android devices and Windows PCs.

Initially available in the U.S. and certain other regions, the expanded Nearby Share app is geared for Windows computers running a 64-bit version of Windows 10 or 11.

articles.title: What the Tech? How to leave behind your Google account to a trusted friend or family member
articles.author: Jamey Tucker
articles.excerpt: Here's how it works: You'll choose who you want to share your information with if you pass away.
articles.summary:
Leaving behind your digital information, your usernames, and passwords is tricky. You can write down all of your user names and passwords and give to a friend or include them with a will. But Google has a tool for this that not many people know about.
It's called "Inactive Account Manager."
Here's how it works: You'll choose who you want to share your information with if you pass away. You'll decide what information you'd like to share from your Google account. Share your email, calendar, contacts, photos, and anything else you feel is important.

articles.title: There's Finally An AirDrop for Windows and Android Users
articles.author: Khamosh Pathak
articles.excerpt: Google's new beta app brings fast wireless file sharing to Android and Windows.
articles.summary: AirDrop has been a source of pride for Apple users for more than a decade now, and a sore point for many who want a simple solution for sharing files between Windows and Android. But after years of struggling with different standards and technologies, Google and Microsoft have finally figured this one out: Google's Nearby Share protocol brought AirDrop-like file sharing to Android devices back in 2020, and thanks to a new beta that anyone can download, the same feature is available on Windows PCs as well.

articles.title: Google's ChatGPT Gambit: Sundar Pichai Announces AI Chatbot for Search Engine
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.excerpt: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google CEO Sundar Pichai shared plans to integrate conversational artificial intelligence features into its flagship search engine. Advances in AI would supercharge Google's ability to answer an array of search queries, Pichai said in an interview with the Wall Street Journal. Pichai acknowledged more enormous opportunities dismissing reports suggesting that chatbots hindered Google's search business, which accounts for more than half of revenue. Also
articles.summary:
Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google CEO Sundar Pichai shared plans to integrate conversational artificial intelligence features into its flagship search engine.
Advances in AI would supercharge Google's ability to answer an array of search queries, Pichai said in an interview with the Wall Street Journal.
Pichai acknowledged more enormous opportunities dismissing reports suggesting that chatbots hindered Google's search business, which accounts for more than half of revenue.

Pichai proposes to tap Google's lead in developing computer programs called large language models, or LLMs, in the search function, which can process and respond to natural-language prompts with humanlike prose.

articles.title: Hands on: Android's Nearby Share for Windows just works [Video]
articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.excerpt: One of the tools that I've always been a little envious of from Apple's ecosystem has been AirDrop. While it's...
articles.summary:
One of the tools that I've always been a little envious of from Apple's ecosystem has been AirDrop. While it's not something I want to use constantly, being able to throw a file from my phone to my computer or vice versa is compelling. Now, that's 
finally
 possible on and , as Google has released Nearby Share for the Microsoft-owned platform, and it's wonderful.
 
 
Nearby Share was 
announced for PCs in early 2022
, but Google was pretty much silent about the feature in the following months. Even at CES 2023 this year, a full year after Google had announced the feature, there 
was still nothing to share
.
articles.authors: Abner Li,Ben Schoon,Ben'S Smartwatch,Especially With Samsung Phones,Galaxy Watch,Google Pixel Watch,Kyle Bradshaw

articles.title: How to use Nearby Share for Windows
articles.author: Barbara Krasnoff
articles.excerpt: Now, Windows / Android users have their own version of Apple AirDrop.
articles.summary:
While my personal computers have mostly been Windows and my phones Android, I do use a Mac for work, and I've always been envious of the ease with which people in the Apple ecosystem can move files from one device to another using AirDrop. Google introduced a similar feature called Nearby Share 
in 2020
, but it only shared files between Google products. Now, Windows has finally introduced 
its version of Nearby Share
, currently in beta, allowing you to easily move files between Windows and Android systems.

articles.title: Google launches Nearby Share beta for transferring files between Windows and Android
articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.excerpt: It was during January 2022's Consumer Electronics Show that Google announced its plans to improve connectivity between the Android and Windows operating systems. In addition to Fast...
articles.summary:
What just happened?
 Google is rolling out a beta version of Nearby Share, another tool that will make it easier for Android users to transfer files between their devices and Windows. It comes after Google first talked about the updated feature back at CES 2022 as part of its pledge to tighten integration between its mobile OS and Microsoft's platform. 
 
It was during January 2022's Consumer Electronics Show that Google 
announced
 its plans to improve connectivity between the Android and Windows operating systems.

articles.title: Android's answer to AirDrop is finally coming to your Windows PC
articles.author: Hamish Hector
articles.excerpt: Send files between your Android Phone and PC with Nearby Share
articles.summary:
(Image credit: Google)






Google's answer to Apple's AirDrop just got a big upgrade with the launch of its Nearby Share for Windows PC app beta.
Just like 
how you use AirDrop
, Nearby Share lets you quickly and easily share files between nearby Android devices. This feature tends to be quicker than sending files via an email or Google Drive link, and is simpler than trying to transfer them over a typical Bluetooth connection. 
Nearby Share just got a lot better, however, as it now lets you do more than just ping files between the 
best Android phones
, tablets, and 
best Chromebooks
 – you can now send files to your Windows PC, too.

articles.title: Google Skills Food Cart On Wheels
articles.author: Barry Schwartz
articles.excerpt: Here is a photo shared by Michelle Donelan, Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology of the United Kingdom, from Chippenham of a food cart with a Google logo.She shared this on Twitte
articles.summary:
Here is a photo shared by Michelle Donelan, Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology of the United Kingdom, from Chippenham of a food cart with a Google logo.
She shared this on 
Twitter
, and said "Fantastic to bring Google UK to the Cyber Confidence Centre in Chippenham today, improving over 70 small, local and independent businesses digital skills & digital marketing with workshops and training! A huge thank you to the BCC and the trainers from Google for their help."
This post is part of our daily 
Search Photo of the Day
 column, where we find fun and interesting photos related to the search industry and share them with our readers.

articles.title: Google Nearby Share Rolls Out to Windows PCs: How to Transfer Files from Android
articles.author: Teejay Boris
articles.excerpt: Android and PC users, here's how to start using it:
articles.summary:
Google Nearby Share feature, Android's version of Apple's AirDrop, is now finally available to Windows PC users.
 
Previously, the wireless file transfer service of the renowned tech giant was only exclusive to Android mobile phones, tablets, and Chromebooks or ChromeOS machines.
 
 
 
But this time around, Windows users may now ditch their dangling cables when sharing files from their Android phone to their PC or laptop or vice versa.
 
The Nearby Share feature of Google for Android and ChromeOS is now embracing more users as it is now heading to Microsoft's Windows.
articles.rights: All articles are copyrighted by Tech Times

articles.title: How Search Chips Make File Management Easier in Google Drive
articles.author: Saikat Basu
articles.excerpt: Search chip filter buttons can save you the bother of scrolling through an endless list of files on Google Drive.
articles.summary:
A large team sharing a workspace on Google Drive can make finding Google Drive files and folders difficult. Search chips in Google Drive can lessen this pain and boost your workflow. Search chips are more visual search filter shortcuts to help drill down to the correct file type. Google is gradually rolling out the Search chips feature across all account types, so you should see it arrive on your Drive soon.
 
 How Do Search Chips in Google Drive Work? 


Search chips are present by default below the search bar as buttons that enable you to filter by different types of file criteria.

articles.title: Google's Nearby Share arrives on Windows to let you transfer files between PC and Android
articles.author: Erin Fox
articles.excerpt: Google's AirDrop competitor, Nearby Share, is now available on Windows as a beta app. After announcing plans for Nearby Share on Windows at CES 2022,
articles.summary:
Google's AirDrop competitor, Nearby Share, is now available on Windows as a beta app. After announcing plans for Nearby Share on Windows at CES 2022, Google has finally shipped the Windows app as a beta to allow Android users to share photos, documents, files, and links between Android devices and Windows PCs.

The Windows Nearby Share just needs to be installed and configured to start sending and receiving files between Android and Windows devices. Google is supporting Windows 10 and up, but ARM-powered Windows laptops aren't supported right now.

articles.title: Google Makes It Easier to Share Files Between Windows and Android
articles.author: Marco Marcelline
articles.excerpt: The Nearby Share beta app makes it possible to send photos, documents, and files between PCs and Android devices as long as they are within 16 feet of each other.
articles.summary:
Google has improved Android's integration with Windows, making it a lot easier to transfer files between Android devices and Windows PC.

In a blog post(Opens in a new window), the tech giant revealed it had rolled out the beta Nearby Share(Opens in a new window) app which makes it possible to send photos, documents, and files between PCs and Android devices as long as they are within 16 feet of each other.

In 2020, Google launched Nearby Share which enables users to quickly send and receive content across Android phones, tablets, and Chromebooks.

articles.title: Google Chat vs WhatsApp 2023: which one is better for you
articles.author: Dian Erwin
articles.excerpt: Google Chat is a way to send and receive messages that was made by Google. It's part of Google Workspace, which used to be called G Suite. Users can use
articles.summary:
Google Chat is a way to send and receive messages that was made by Google. It's part of Google Workspace, which used to be called G Suite. Users can use it for instant messaging, voice and video calls, and to work together. Google Chat is mostly made for businesses and organizations to make it easier for them to talk to each other and work together.

On the other hand, Facebook owns the messaging app WhatsApp. It's a free messaging app that works on multiple platforms and lets people send text messages, voice messages, make voice and video calls, share media, and more.
articles.authors: Dian Erwin,Dian Erwin Is A Writer,Ios. Tony Spends Much Too Much,Published By,Such As Laptops,Tablets,Windows

articles.title: Google users told to check accounts today for ‘surprise' payments – one had $1,072 waiting in ‘reward cashback'
articles.author: Jona Jaupi
articles.excerpt: GOOGLE Pay users have been shocked to find out they have been accruing cashback for some mysterious reason. In recent social media posts, Google Pay users shared that they found free money in their…
articles.summary:
GOOGLE Pay users have been shocked to find out they have been accruing cashback for some mysterious reason.

In recent social media posts, Google Pay users shared that they found free money in their rewards section.

1

One person noted on Reddit that they got almost $100 in six different cashback rewards for "dogfooding the Google Pay remittance experience."

Another person shared on Twitter that they got $13.25 for the same reason.

"Uhhh, Google Pay seems to just be randomly giving users free money right now," the person tweeted.

articles.title: Google's War on Loan Apps: Enhancing Privacy and Security for All Users
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.excerpt: On Wednesday, Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google shared plans to update policies for financial services apps listed on the Google Play store at the end of May to prevent the "so-called" loan apps from accessing user contacts or photos. Google will bar lending apps from requesting access to users' precise locations, phone numbers, and videos, Financial Times reports citing the company's policy details. The new policy covers apps offering personal, payday, and peer-to-peer loans bu
articles.summary:
On Wednesday, Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google shared plans to update policies for financial services apps listed on the Google Play store at the end of May to prevent the "so-called" loan apps from accessing user contacts or photos.
Google will bar lending apps from requesting access to users' precise locations, phone numbers, and videos, Financial Times reports citing the company's policy details.
The new policy covers apps offering personal, payday, and peer-to-peer loans but not mortgages, car loans, or credit cards.

articles.title: 'Listen, I don't know': Customer says Apple Store Genius was secretly Googling how to fix her AirPods
articles.author: Vladimir Supica
articles.excerpt: An Apple customer claims that a Genius Bar employee was secretly googling how to help with her AirPods issue.
articles.summary:
Even geniuses have to Google it sometimes.
 
An 
Apple
 customer claims that a 
Genius Bar
 employee was secretly googling how to help with her AirPods issue.
 
In the video, which was posted on March 28 and has over 483.900 views, TikTok user Danessy Auguste (@danessyauguste) shared her experience of visiting an Apple Store to fix her AirPods, which were not connecting to her phone.
 
 
 
@danessyauguste
 
I was flabbergasted 
 
♬ original sound – Danessy Auguste
 
 
 
'I get my little ass, I dropped my sister over to Apple and I told the guy the problem that I'm dealing with.

articles.title: Celo Foundation and Google Cloud partner to support sustainable Web3 startups
articles.author: Judith Bannermanquist
articles.excerpt: The Founders in Residence program by the Celo Foundation will receive mentorship and guidance from the Google Cloud team.
articles.summary:
The Celo Foundation has partnered with Google Cloud to support mission-aligned projects in Celo's blockchain ecosystem and advance the early adoption of Google Cloud services. The collaboration is set to allow founders building on Celo to access credits for Google Cloud and Firebase usage, thereby enhancing Celo's mobile-first infrastructure and 
decentralized applications (Dapps)
. 
Firebase is a mobile and web application development platform developed by Google that provides developers with various tools and services for building apps, including authentication, real-time databases, cloud storage, and messaging.

articles.title: Google Meet vs Zoom 2023: which one is better for video calling
articles.author: Dian Erwin
articles.excerpt: Google Meet and Zoom are both platforms for video conferencing that have become popular ways to communicate and work together from far away. One big
articles.summary:
Google Meet and Zoom are both platforms for video conferencing that have become popular ways to communicate and work together from far away. One big difference between the two is that you can make a different header for each paragraph in one but not the other.

Users of Google Meet can give their meeting a name or label that will show up at the top of the video call screen. This can help a user tell the meeting apart from other events on their calendar and make it easier to find.

On the other hand, Zoom lets you make a virtual background, which can be a custom image or logo that shows up behind the user during the video call.
articles.authors: Dian Erwin,Dian Erwin Is A Writer,Ios. Tony Spends Much Too Much,Published By,Such As Laptops,Tablets,Windows

articles.title: Google 開始公測 Windows PC 版 Nearby Share， 與 Android 連動更便利
articles.author: Eric Chan
articles.excerpt: Google回到 CES 2022，Google 公開表示要提升 Android 系統與 Windows 生態產品的多方面整合，其中一個就是要讓兩個平台能簡易傳輸檔案，這就需要依靠 Nearby Share 咫尺共享功能。今天 Google 終於帶來 Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 的公測，有興趣的朋友可以到 Android 官網下載給 64-bit 版本 Windows 或以上、非 ARM 處理器的機器使用，而且需要支援藍牙和 Wi-Fi。Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 使用時與 Android 版本一樣，在開啟藍牙和 Wi-Fi 之後就可以在下拉式選單中啟動分享功能，這時候也要選擇裝置可見度，即能讓所有人都可以查看到或是只有聯絡人。接下來就是把想要分享的檔案拖曳到分享視窗，或是右鍵點擊來選用 Nearby Share；如果是登入同樣 Google 帳戶的裝置，更能自動接受並儲存檔案。Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 使用限制就是需要收發雙方需要在 5 米之內。目前 Google 僅開放美國和歐洲部分地區試用公測 Window
articles.summary:
回到 CES 2022，Google 公開表示要提升 Android 系統與 Windows 生態產品的多方面整合，其中一個就是要讓兩個平台能簡易傳輸檔案，這就需要依靠 Nearby Share 咫尺共享功能。今天 Google 終於帶來 Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 的公測，有興趣的朋友可以到 Android 官網下載給 64-bit 版本 Windows 或以上、非 ARM 處理器的機器使用，而且需要支援藍牙和 Wi-Fi。
Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 使用時與 Android 版本一樣，在開啟藍牙和 Wi-Fi 之後就可以在下拉式選單中啟動分享功能，這時候也要選擇裝置可見度，即能讓所有人都可以查看到或是只有聯絡人。接下來就是把想要分享的檔案拖曳到分享視窗，或是右鍵點擊來選用 Nearby Share；如果是登入同樣 Google 帳戶的裝置，更能自動接受並儲存檔案。Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 使用限制就是需要收發雙方需要在 5 米之內。
目前 Google 僅開放美國和歐洲部分地區試用公測 Windows PC

articles.title: Google's ChatGPT Gambit: Sundar Pichai Announces AI Chatbot for Search Engine
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.summary:
Alphabet Inc GOOG GOOGL Google CEO Sundar Pichai shared plans to integrate conversational artificial intelligence features into its flagship search engine.
Advances in AI would supercharge Google's ability to answer an array of search queries, Pichai said in an interview with the Wall Street Journal.
Pichai acknowledged more enormous opportunities dismissing reports suggesting that chatbots hindered Google's search business, which accounts for more than half of revenue.
Pichai proposes to tap Google's lead in developing computer programs called large language models, or LLMs, in the search function, which can process and respond to natural-language prompts with humanlike prose.

articles.title: WA attorney general joins others in Google lawsuit
articles.author: BILL KACZARABA
articles.excerpt: The Washington State Attorney General is joining a Justice Department's lawsuit against Google accusing it of monopolizing online display ads.
articles.summary:
A cursor moves over Google's search engine page. (AP Photo/Don Ryan, File)
 
(AP Photo/Don Ryan, File)
 
 
Washington State Attorney General Bob Ferguson is going after Google once more as he joins the 
U.S. Justice Department's lawsuit
 against the tech giant, claiming the company unlawfully monopolizes online display advertising.


This is the fourth time the attorney general has been part of an antitrust lawsuit against Google.


'An open marketplace encourages competition and creativity,' Ferguson said in a statement.

articles.title: Google Releases Nearby Share Beta for Windows
articles.author: Paul Thurrott
articles.excerpt: Google has released a beta version of its Nearby Share app for Windows that helps you share files in both directions with your Android phone.
articles.summary:
Google has released a beta version of its Nearby Share app for Windows that helps you share files in both directions with your Android phone.


'Nearby Share Beta works with your Windows PC whether the app is open on the desktop or running in the background,' Google's Priya Samnerkar 
writes
. 'Sending a photo, video, or document from your PC to a nearby Android device is as easy as dragging and dropping it into the app, or by selecting ‘Send with Nearby Share' in the right-click menu. Just select which Android devices you want to share with from the list that pops up.

articles.title: Google facilitate for Windows and Android users to share files
articles.author: Elizabeth Haire
articles.excerpt: Google has made it much easier to move files between Android devices and Windows PCs by making Android work better with Windows. Google has put out a beta
articles.summary:
Google has made it much easier to move files between Android devices and Windows PCs by making Android work better with Windows. Google has put out a beta version of its Nearby Share app, which lets you send photos, documents, and other files between PCs and Android devices that are within 16 feet of each other.

In 2020, Google released Nearby Share, which makes it easy to send and receive content on Android phones, tablets, and Chromebooks. It has been made bigger by adding Windows file sharing.

articles.title: Can Alphabet Survive the AI Revolution? What GOOG Stock Investors Need to Know
articles.author: Faizan Farooque
articles.excerpt: GOOG stock is attractively valued and remains a compelling investment option with the generative AI race far from over.
articles.summary:
A
lphabet 
(NASDAQ:
GOOG
, NASDAQ:
GOOGL
) faced an unusual setback when 
the stock dropped by over $100 billion
 following a mishap with its generative AI earlier in the year. Specifically, its 
Bard chatbot ad
 provided inaccurate information. Furthermore, analysts criticized the company's AI search event for lacking details on responding to 
Microsoft's
 (NASDAQ:
MSFT
) ChatGPT challenge in Feb.


Alphabet is in a favorable position, having recently opened 
Bard to the U.S. and UK public
. This development marks a shift from the company's previous cautious approach.

articles.title: Google 開始公測 Windows PC 版 Nearby Share， 與 Android 連動更便利
articles.excerpt: 今天 Google 終於帶來 Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 的公測，有興趣的朋友可以到 Android 官網下載給 64-bit 版本 Windows 或以上、非 ARM 處理器的機器使用，而且需要支援藍牙和 Wi-Fi。
articles.summary:
回到 CES 2022，Google 公開表示要提升 Android 系統與 Windows 生態產品的多方面整合，其中一個就是要讓兩個平台能簡易傳輸檔案，這就需要依靠 
Nearby Share 咫尺共享
功能。今天 Google 終於帶來 Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 的公測，有興趣的朋友可以到 
Android 官網
下載給 64-bit 版本 Windows 或以上、非 ARM 處理器的機器使用，而且需要支援藍牙和 Wi-Fi。


Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 使用時與 Android 版本一樣，在開啟藍牙和 Wi-Fi 之後就可以在下拉式選單中啟動分享功能，這時候也要選擇裝置可見度，即能讓所有人都可以查看到或是只有聯絡人。接下來就是把想要分享的檔案拖曳到分享視窗，或是右鍵點擊來選用 Nearby Share；如果是登入同樣 Google 帳戶的裝置，更能自動接受並儲存檔案。Windows PC 版 Nearby Share 使用限制就是需要收發雙方需要在 5 米之內。


目前 Google 僅開放美國和歐洲部分地區試用公測 Wi

articles.title: Google's UK Employees Stage Walkout Over Its Downsizing Policy
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.excerpt: Hundreds of Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google employees staged a walkout at the company's London offices on Tuesday following a dispute over layoffs. Trade union Unite, which counts hundreds of Google's U.K. employees among its members, said the company had ignored concerns put forward by employees, Reuters reports. In January, Alphabet shared plans to fire 12,000 employees worldwide, equivalent to 6% of its global workforce. Also Read: Amazon's UK 50p Per Hour Pay Boost Infuria
articles.summary:
Hundreds of Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google employees staged a walkout at the company's London offices on Tuesday following a dispute over layoffs.
Trade union Unite, which counts hundreds of Google's U.K. employees among its members, said the company had ignored concerns put forward by employees, Reuters reports.
In January, Alphabet shared plans to fire 12,000 employees worldwide, equivalent to 6% of its global workforce.

Google employees and Unite threatened not to back down until Google allows workers full union representation, engages appropriately with the consultation process, and treats its staff with the respect and dignity they deserve.

articles.title: Here's how ChatGPT might affect the Alphabet share price
articles.author: John Fieldsend
articles.excerpt: Microsoft just invested $10bn so it can use ChatGPT in its Bing search engine. Here's what I think that will do to the Alphabet share price. The post Here's how ChatGPT might affect the Alphabet share…
articles.summary:
Six months ago, I'd use a chatbot like Siri or Alexa for simple stuff like asking it to play a song. Now, OpenAI's ChatGPT can do so much more. And some believe it could do away with millions of jobs and overturn entire industries. Google, and consequently the Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL) share price, might just be the first thing in its firing line.
The reason this puts Alphabet's dominance in the search engine space under threat is that in January, Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) invested $10bn in ChatGPT.

articles.title: Google Stock: Look Up At The Cloud (NASDAQ:GOOG)
articles.author: Hunting Alpha
articles.excerpt: The implications of generative AI on Google have taken center stage in discussions around the view of the stock. Read why I am bullish on GOOGL stock.
articles.summary:
Look up at the cloud
 
georgeclerk/iStock via Getty Images
 
Developments in generative AI technologies and its implications for Google (
NASDAQ:
GOOG
) (
NASDAQ:
GOOGL
) and it's market leading search engine (
89%
 market share) have taken the center stage in discussions around the stock. No doubt, these factors will determine
 the fate of Google. However, I am wary of making bold predictions of the ultimate winner(s) of the new search function market share leaders. I am skeptical about first-mover advantages other authors have discussed as internet history shows that many initial leaders often do not end up as the ultimate stable market share incumbent leaders.

articles.title: What the Tech: Leaving behind your Google account
articles.author: Jamey Tucker
articles.excerpt: hese are tools many people do not know about until it is too late. Google's tool is called 'Inactive Account Manager'. You're given the option to choose who you want to share your information within…
articles.summary:
AUGUSTA, Ga. (WRDW/WAGT) - When Jamey Tucker's father suffered a stroke last fall it was important that someone gain access to his online accounts.
He'd set up Facebook, Google, Apple, and an old Hotmail accounts over a decade ago.
Those accounts were accessible only to him or someone who knew his login information. He shared those account logins with me before he passed away in December.
Without them, it would have taken a long time to prove to those companies that a family member needed to access the accounts and close them.

articles.title: Alphabet's (GOOGL) Google Boosts Nest Cams With New Feature
articles.author: Zacks Equity Research
articles.excerpt: Alphabet's (GOOGL) Google takes home security to the next level with Garage Door Detection in its Google Nest Cams.
articles.summary: Alphabet's GOOGL division Google has bolstered the home security capabilities of Nest Cams with the introduction of a garage door detection feature.Notably, Nest Cams will now be able to notify homeowners every time their garage door opens and closes. The new feature will also alert users if their garage remains open for an extended time.Also, the feature will provide information on the household vehicle's comings and goings. Additionally, the feature may prove useful in detecting attempted burglaries.

articles.title: Google's War on Loan Apps: Enhancing Privacy and Security for All Users
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.summary:
On Wednesday, Alphabet Inc GOOG GOOGL Google shared plans to update policies for financial services apps listed on the Google Play store at the end of May to prevent the "so-called" loan apps from accessing user contacts or photos.
Google will bar lending apps from requesting access to users' precise locations, phone numbers, and videos, Financial Times reports citing the company's policy details.
The new policy covers apps offering personal, payday, and peer-to-peer loans but not mortgages, car loans, or credit cards.

articles.title: What The Tech: Google helps users create a digital will
articles.author: KWCH Staff
articles.excerpt: Google helps users create a digital will
articles.summary:
WICHITA, Kan. (KWCH) - April 5, 2023
When my father suffered a stroke last fall it was important that someone gain access to his online accounts. He'd set up Facebook, Google, Apple, and an old Hotmail accounts over a decade ago. Those accounts were accessible only to him or someone who knew his login information.
He shared those account logins with me before he passed away in December. Without them, it would have taken a long time to prove to those companies that a family member needed to access the accounts and close them.

articles.title: Google-Owner Alphabet Says Its Chips Can Beat Nvidia's. What This Means for AI.
articles.author: Adam Clark
articles.excerpt: Scientists at Google said their supercomputer is up to 1.7 times faster than a system based on the A100 chip produced by Nvidia.
articles.summary:
Google-parent Alphabet said its chips for training AI systems can be faster and more power-efficient than the rival Nvidia (NVDA) chip currently powering the industry.

The battle to benefit from the growth of artificial intelligence is being waged in hardware as well as services and Alphabet (ticker: GOOGL) is fighting on both fronts with Google making advances in the competition over AI hardware.

The tech giant uses custom tensor processing units, or TPUs, for training AI systems. In a scientific paper on Tuesday, researchers at Google gave details of the performance of a supercomputer powered by more than 4,000 of the latest generation of those chips.

articles.title: How to Use Google's Nearby Share to Share Files Between Android and Windows
articles.author: Pankil Shah
articles.excerpt: Quickly send files between your Android phone and a Windows device with Google's Nearby Share.
articles.summary:
Previously, you could only use Google's Nearby Share feature to share files between Android devices and Chromebooks. However, this has changed with Google's release of Nearby Share Beta for Windows. With it, you can seamlessly exchange photos, videos, documents, and more between Android phones and Windows PCs.
 
Let's see how you can use Google's Nearby Share app to transfer files between Android devices and Windows computers.
 
Google<\>"> 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Image Credit: 
Google
 
 
\
 
 
Before we get started, let's go over some prerequisites for exchanging files via Google's Nearby Share app for Windows.

articles.title: Official Google policy change adjusts ‘storage limits' for billions of users – check new rules to see if it benefits you
articles.author: Callie Patteson
articles.excerpt: GOOGLE has walked back a major storage change for billions of users that limited many, despite paying for extra storage.  The tech giant announced Monday it would be rolling back a recent 'sys…
articles.summary:
GOOGLE has walked back a major storage change for billions of users that limited many, despite paying for extra storage.

The tech giant announced Monday it would be rolling back a recent 'system update' to Google Drive that limited the number of items users could create to 'preserve stability and optimize performance.'

'While this impacted only a small number of people, we are rolling back this change as we explore alternate approaches to ensure a great experience for all,' Google said in a tweet.

articles.title: How to share your location on Android
articles.author: Hagop Kavafian
articles.excerpt: Google Maps isn't the only way to share your location.
articles.summary:
Whether you're driving and want to share your live location with people or want your friends and family to know where you are all the time, 
Android phones
 provide an easy way to do that, permanently or for a limited time. The easiest way to 
share your location is by using Google Maps
, at least if you're not doing it for a short time. There are other methods to consider, such as sending it in a message. Read on to find out which option is the best for your needs.
 
 Google Maps​​​​ 


Google Maps has the most comprehensive location-sharing functionality.

articles.title: Watch Out Expedia
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.excerpt: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google launched Search tools for browsing hotels, saving money on flights, and other tools for summer travel. Google introduced an easier way to browse and discover hotels on mobile. With a single tap, users can save the hotel, pull up more details about the area, or view a summary of what people find notable about the property. After viewing the property, the users can swipe up to continue browsing. On Google Flights, users can see whether current pri
articles.summary:
Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google launched Search tools for browsing hotels, saving money on flights, and other tools for summer travel.
Google introduced an easier way to browse and discover hotels on mobile.
With a single tap, users can save the hotel, pull up more details about the area, or view a summary of what people find notable about the property. After viewing the property, the users can swipe up to continue browsing.
On Google Flights, users can see whether current prices are low, typical, or high compared to historical averages.

articles.title: What happens to your Google account when you die? Why you should create a digital will
articles.author: Jamey Tucker
articles.excerpt: It's one of those things people don't like to talk about, but have you ever wondered what happens to all your online accounts after you die? Here's how to create
articles.summary:
When my father suffered a stroke last fall it was important that someone gain access to his online accounts. He'd set up Facebook, Google, Apple, and an old Hotmail accounts over a decade ago. Those accounts were accessible only to him or someone who knew his login information.
He shared those account logins with me before he passed away in December. Without them, it would have taken a long time to prove to those companies that a family member needed to access the accounts and close them. That often requires a relative to submit copies of a death certificate and obituary and then wait until it is approved and access is granted.

articles.title: Google's Nearby Share Beta for Windows makes it easier to transfer files between your phone and PC
articles.author: Peter Holden
articles.excerpt: Anyone using an Android smartphone knows how painful it is to transfer files and images from a handset to a Windows PC, often resorting to uploading the
articles.summary:
Anyone using an Android smartphone knows how painful it is to transfer files and images from a handset to a Windows PC, often resorting to uploading the content to the cloud or even emailing it to oneself. While several smartphone brands have developed their own solutions, Google has just launched its new Nearby Share Beta for Windows which aims to solve the issue regardless of which Android handset you use. 
 
 


 
Google's Nearby Share Beta for Windows will let users send and receive files from smartphones and tablets that support 
Nearby Share
 and run on Android 6.
